identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Sales Brain' interface that feels intelligent, not generic.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with AI 'magic'.
Emotion First: The user should feel 'omniscient' and 'in control'.
Content is King: Data is the hero; UI is the stage.
Zoom In: Focus on the details (customer sentiment, sales signals).
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load.

usage.headings: Plus Jakarta Sans, weights 600-800. Tight tracking (-0.02em).
usage.data: JetBrains Mono, for IDs, API keys, and raw metrics.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@500;600;700;800&display=swap');

colors.description: A high-contrast, intelligence-focused palette. Deep slate for focus, electric violet for AI actions.

rules: Clicking a row opens a side drawer (Sheet) for details.

cards.style: Flat with subtle border in light mode; Glass-like in dark mode.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-md rounded-lg px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary rounded-lg h-10

status_badges.style: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients for 'AI' moments (e.g., generating a response). Avoid full-screen gradients.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid var(--border). In dark mode, use white/5 for a crisp edge.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Duotone) for feature highlights.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Don't cram content.
Contrast: Ensure text is readable. Use APCA standards.
Motion: Add micro-interactions to every button and card hover.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements MUST have a data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow these guidelines strictly. Start by setting up the global CSS variables in index.css to match the 'Neural Slate' palette. Then, build the layout shell (Sidebar + Header). Finally, implement the pages using the specified grid layouts.
